What is Internet Marketing?
Internet marketing is knowledge (skills) that help to work with electronic channels (SEO, SMM, contextual advertising) and attract customers from the Internet.
Where to increase the budget, how to correctly calculate the profitability of each traffic flow to the site.
Now internet marketing is all about profit and making decisions about a particular ad.
How to create an online business? We study competitors

Before creating a website, it is recommended to study all the competitors on the Internet in your region. For example a niche: radio-controlled toys. We study competitors: direct and indirect and write down the advantages and disadvantages.
Find competing sites using the seranking.com
We go to each of the sites and carefully study the unique selling proposition (USP) and the structure of the sites:
Abbreviated example of an analysis of a company selling RC models https://www.rcplanet.com

Conclusions: it is better to start with 5–10 categories in order to create a wider range of products on the site. It is possible to work on pre-order for new models entering the market. To study what details for models users order. Having an offline store will inspire more confidence.
We create a website

We create a business card website or online store. You can start with a website builder, it is much faster and cheaper. The site will already be optimized for mobile devices, fast loading pages and payment by plastic cards.
And you will receive the first orders within 2–5 days after development. First, buy a domain and link to a website builder:
Domain binding will contribute to promotion, memorability and in the future will simplify the possible transfer of the site to your own CMS. You can buy a domain using the link https://godaddy.com
Add more customer reviews, case studies, numbers. It is important to inspire trust in the prospect and create value for the product.
Setting goals

Ideally, we connect a separate phone for each channel with details on requests from contextual advertising in order to understand which requests are profitable and periodically review and disconnect non-working ones.
Site test using contextual advertising

After we have created a website or a group on social networks (Instagram, Facebook) and set up goals, then we test it for conversion using paid advertising: google adwords, advertising on Facebook or Instagram.
Be sure to include remarketing in google adwords, facebook. We use retmarketing (pursuit) to catch up with users who have already visited our site.

Each repeated contact with our site increases the opportunity to purchase a product or service. Remarketing increases loyalty to your brand and makes the total cost of applications / calls from the site cheaper. Use remarketing!
Setting up contextual advertising at the start is better to order from freelancers. Then you will gradually learn this tool, including communicating with a freelancer.
You can find an freelancer on the sites:

You can start with an advertising budget of $ 200- $ 300 per month. After a month of testing, you should understand the cost of the application for each of the advertising channels and understand your profit, ROI and draw conclusions.

After talking on the phone with clients and studying the applications from your site, an understanding of the target audience (gender, age, demography) will come. This information will be useful for adjusting advertising campaigns in google adwords, facebook.
In addition to gender and age, you can increase the rates for mobile users.
SEO (search engine promotion)
SEO (search engine promotion) is an action aimed at improving the visibility of a site in search engines. The main goal is traffic from Yandex and Google search engines.

Links

After creating and optimizing the project, it is recommended to test it using contextual advertising for 1–2 months, then, having understood the profitable categories, the products should start working with the link mass.

It is better to buy links for related topics and your region, then related topics and the general region. For example: a real estate agency in New York. We buy links on all sites in New York and everything related to real estate in New York and throughout the United States.

Contextual advertising

Contextual advertising is ads (text, image, video) that are shown to users in accordance with their search queries, interests or behavior on the Internet. Contextual advertising is shown in search engines, on various sites, in mobile applications, etc.
If you are planning to launch contextual advertising in Yandex Direct or google adwords for the first time, we recommend that you contact specialized specialists.

Content marketing
Content marketing is the distribution of useful content that is not direct advertising, but which indirectly convinces the audience to make the necessary decision to purchase a product or service.
The ways of distributing information content can be very diverse: sites, blogs, social networks, books, magazines, podcasts, seminars. Valuable content should be unique and useful.
